manifest.name: Contextual Typography
manifest.description: This plugin adds a data-tag-name attribute to all top-level divs in preview mode containing the child's tag name, allowing contextual typography styling.
manifest.author: mgmeyers

data.manifestValue: This plugin adds a data-tag-name attribute to all top-level divs in preview mode containing the child's tag name, allowing contextual typography styling.
data.communityListValue: Add a data-tag-name attribute to all top-level divs in preview mode containing the child's tag name, allowing contextual typography styling.
